text: Þis synd þa landgemæra to Deorlafestune.
ærest hit fehð on trentan þær fulan broc scyt on trentan.
Þonne andlang broces ongean stream on fulanford.
Of ðæm forda on bradan ford.
Of bradan forda west andlang stræte on hwæte croft.
Of ðæm crofte on grenan hylle.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on þa stræt to þam ðrym landgemæren.
Þonne andlang weges on ðære dic ende.
Of ðære dic on gerihtna to sceortan stane.
Of ðæm stane on ðone wylle.
Of ðære dene þæt eft on trentan.
